name: Sub-Orbit Shootout
description:
Blast ships in the dusty sub-orbit of a dying planet.

Stay alive as long as possible against an endless stream of enemies.

Dodge lasers, avoid asteroids, try not to crash.

 

First game project. Made for fun. Expect some rough edges, but hope you enjoy!

Mac and Linux builds not guaranteed to not suck.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • WASD: Forward and reverse thrust, steer
  • Space: Shoot
  • P: Pause
  • R: Restart
  • Destroy as many enemies as you can
  • Keep blowing up ships to increase your score multiplier
  • Your ship repairs when not firing
  • Get high scores and climb the fancy, online leaderboard!!
  • [There's no fancy, online leaderboard. Take a screenshot and tell your friends]

CREDITS:

  • A game by Trent Lundquist
